meta.description: Determine the minimum cost of producing a plant growth compound by mixing fertilizers C and Y to meet nitrous oxide and vitamin mix requirements.

sets.name: FERTILIZERS
sets.description: Types of fertilizers used in the compound.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per kg of each fertilizer.

params.name: nitrous_oxide_content
params.description: Units of nitrous oxide per kg of each fertilizer.

params.name: vitamin_mix_content
params.description: Units of vitamin mix per kg of each fertilizer.

params.name: nitrous_oxide_requirement
params.description: Minimum units of nitrous oxide required in the compound.

params.name: vitamin_mix_requirement
params.description: Minimum units of vitamin mix required in the compound.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of each fertilizer used in kg.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FERTILIZERS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the fertilizers used.

constraints.name: nitrous_oxide_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(nitrous_oxide_content[f] * x[f] for f in FERTILIZERS)
constraints.description: Ensure the compound contains at least the required units of nitrous oxide.

constraints.name: vitamin_mix_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(vitamin_mix_content[f] * x[f] for f in FERTILIZERS)
constraints.description: Ensure the compound contains at least the required units of vitamin mix.
